name: AQuest
description: AQuest is a creative production and technology company that aims to capture and communicate the essence of a brand and its products by creating memorable experiences. They pride themselves on thorough exploration, attention to detail, and a focus on customer and user needs.
awards: Highest number of digital excellence awards in Italy

events.name: DDDx Palermo
events.description: Annual event hosted by AQuest to meet the needs of their community in central and southern Italy.
